department: Office of the Superintendent of Financial Institutions
description: Dynamics 365 IT professional services in National Capital Region.
tags: Office of the Superintendent of Financial Institutions
full_summary:
**Notice of Proposed Procurement**
### Dynamics Professional Services

**Reference Number:** PW-23-01030585
**Amendment Number:** 2
**Solicitation Number:** 20222431
**Publication Date:** March 22, 2023
**Tender Closing Date:** 2:00 PM (Eastern Time), April 19, 2023

**Background**
The Office of the Superintendent of Financial Institutions (OSFI) is seeking a contract for Dynamics Professional Services under the Task-Based Informatics Professional Services (TBIPS) methodology. The requirement is for IT professional services in the National Capital Region (NCR) to deliver expertise related to Dynamics 365 over the next two to three fiscal years.

**Notice Details**

* **Solicitation Method:** Competitive
* **Trade Agreements:** World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), Canadian-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Notice Type:** Request for Proposal
* **Publication Language:** English
* **Regions of Opportunity:** National Capital Region (NCR)
* **Regions of Delivery:** National Capital Region (NCR)

**Contract Details**

* **Duration:** From contract award date to two years later with an irrevocable option to extend for an additional one-year period
* **Estimated Delivery Date:** April 1, 2025
* **Estimated Level of Effort:** TBD (Per Task Authorizations)
* **Contract Authority:** Aleksandra Green, Contracting@osfi-bsif.gc.ca

**Security Requirements**

* **Common PS SRCL #19** applies
* **Minimum Corporate Security:** Designated Organization Screening (DOS)
* **Minimum Resource Security:** Secret

**Presentation and Evaluation Criteria**

* Information sessions will not be conducted due to the confidential nature of the documents.
* Proposal submissions are due on April 19, 2023, at 2:00 PM (Eastern Time).
* Bidders will be evaluated based on their response to the Request for Proposal (RFP) and, if advisable by the Contracting Authority, on-site presentations may not be conducted due to the confidential nature of the documents.

**Submission Requirements**

* All submissions are to be submitted electronically through Buy and Sell (GC) website.
* All proposal documents must be in French or English, excluding appendices that may be in a different language. Document signing or signature blocks must be provided in the official language of the document.
* Contracts shall be negotiated
